name: Ultimate Card Games
summary: Ultimate Brain Games is a game developed by Cosmigo and published by Telegames for the Nintendo DS, Game Boy Advance, and PlayStation platforms. It contains several thinking games, such as Chess and Checkers. The Nintendo DS version of the game was originally announced in 2004 and the release date is currently listed as TBD.[1]
info:
• 平台: Game Boy Advance
  • 游戏类型: 卡牌
  • 游玩人数: Single player, multiplayer
  • 发行日期: 2004年5月
